item.title: The $51 Printer That Outlived Everything: A 2025 Look at the Brother HL-2230
item.description: A 12-year retrospective on a $51 Brother HL-2230 laser printer that quietly outlived computers, operating systems, and entire life chapters â€” and still just works in 2025.
